description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element

nodes.html: <html class="modern js canvas canvastext no-touch history rgba textshadow csstransforms csstransforms3d csstransitions video audio applicationcache svg inlinesvg smil svgclippaths mediaqueries no-jsautomargins displaytable widthboundsontables absolutepositionontables nav-ready bp-nav-desktop bp-footer-desktop" dir="ltr" style="" lang="en">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document does not have a non-empty <title> element

any.message: Document does not have a non-empty <title> element

help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation
